AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: driver of the truck and trailer, answered questions from Haston and Cox, showed signs of nervousness but denied presence of drugs, gave consent to search the truck and trailer without hesitation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator who asked Saldana many questions, became more aggressive as suspicions grew, applied pressure to elicit cooperation, obtained consent to search from Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: officer involved in the traffic stop, engaged in a cooperative conversation with Saldana
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer, temporarily detained Saldana due to increasing suspicions of drug trafficking
